TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Btug, title = Btug, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Btug} }

S.FORM: Btug o kingal qngqaya djiyun qmpah dxgal Truku sbiyaw, btug nii o snalu dha rqling djima, dhngulun dha ka isilmdka yayu mkan balay. Kmtuy masu ka Truku sbiyaw o asi ka dmuuy btug, kika mrana ngalun dha ka masu ngalun dha hkawas duri, ini tduwa dmuuy snalu xiluy ka qngqay kmtuy masu, yasa aji mha malu nangal masu ka hkawas da msa ka rudan.

Btog o kingal qngqaya djiyon qmpah dxgal Troko sbiyaw, btog nii o snalo dha rqling djima, dhngolon dha ka isilmdka yayo mkan balay. Kmtoy maso ka Troko sbiyaw o asi ka dmooy btog, kika mrana ngalon dha ka maso ngalon dha hkawas dori, ini tdowa dmooy snalo xiloy ka qngqay kmtoy maso, yasa aji mha malo nangal maso ka hkawas da msa ka rodan.
